Sentencas: Control strategy plays a significant role in ensuring system stability and performance as well as equipment protection for maximum service life.
Titulo: Control Strategies for Start-Up and Part-Load Operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell/Gas Turbine Hybrid System

Sentencas: This work is aimed at investigating the control strategies for start-up and part-load operating conditions of the solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine (SOFC/GT) hybrid system.
Titulo: Control Strategies for Start-Up and Part-Load Operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell/Gas Turbine Hybrid System

Sentencas: First, a dynamic SOFC/GT hybrid cycle, based on the thermodynamic modeling of system components, has been successfully developed and simulated in the virtual test bed simulation environment.
Titulo: Control Strategies for Start-Up and Part-Load Operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell/Gas Turbine Hybrid System

Sentencas: The one-dimensional tubular SOFC model is based on the electrochemical and thermal modeling, accounting for voltage losses and temperature dynamics.
Titulo: Control Strategies for Start-Up and Part-Load Operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell/Gas Turbine Hybrid System

Sentencas: The single cell is discretized using a finite volume method where all the governing equations are solved for each finite volume.
Titulo: Control Strategies for Start-Up and Part-Load Operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell/Gas Turbine Hybrid System

Sentencas: Two operating conditions, start-up and part load, are employed to investigate the control strategies of the SOFC/GT hybrid cycle.
Titulo: Control Strategies for Start-Up and Part-Load Operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell/Gas Turbine Hybrid System

Sentencas: In particular, start-up control is adopted to ensure the initial rotation speed of a compressor and a turbine for a system-level operation.
Titulo: Control Strategies for Start-Up and Part-Load Operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell/Gas Turbine Hybrid System

Sentencas: The control objective for the part-load operation regardless of load changes, as proposed, is to maintain constant fuel utilization and a fairly constant SOFC temperature within a small range by manipulating the fuel mass flow and air mass flow.
Titulo: Control Strategies for Start-Up and Part-Load Operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell/Gas Turbine Hybrid System

Sentencas: To this end, the dynamic electrical characteristics such as cell voltage, current density, and temperature under the part load are simulated and analyzed.
Titulo: Control Strategies for Start-Up and Part-Load Operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell/Gas Turbine Hybrid System

Sentencas: Several feedback control cycles are designed from the dynamic responses of electrical characteristics.
Titulo: Control Strategies for Start-Up and Part-Load Operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell/Gas Turbine Hybrid System

Sentencas: Control cycles combined with control related variables are introduced and discussed.
Titulo: Control Strategies for Start-Up and Part-Load Operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell/Gas Turbine Hybrid System
